glsa.title: Wicd: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Wicd, the worst of which might allow execution of arbitrary code as root.

background.p: Wicd is an open source wired and wireless network manager for Linux.

description.p: Two vulnerabilities have been found in Wicd:

ul.li: Passwords and passphrases are written to /var/log/wicd (CVE-2012-0813).
Input from the daemon's D-Bus interface is not properly sanitized (CVE-2012-2095).

impact.p: A local attacker could gain privileges of the root user or obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
